description: A block of mass m is resting stationary on a ramp. What forces are acting on the block?

responses: Draw a diagram of ramp with labels
Draw a free body diagram for the block

request: What are forces acting on block?
responses: Friction acting upwards parallel to the slope

responses.text: Resolve forces parallel and perpendicular to ramp

responses.comment: Makes calculation more difficult because need to resolve both friction and normal reaction along horizontal
Makes calculation more difficult because need to resolve both friction and normal reaction along vertical

request:
Write an expression for the total force perpendicular to the slope. Take positive sense to be upwards.
 Use symbols from the following list:
  m = mass, R= normal reaction, g=acceleration due to gravity, F=friction, theta=angle slope makes with horizontal.
Use * for multiply between symbols.
Use canvas graphical tool to draw forces acting on block and give labels to each force
